tool_description: Providing latest weather information - METAR, TAF, DATIS and RVR and Airport Configuration Information -  Arrival Airport Configuration (AAC), Airport Acceptance Rate (AAR), Tracon Acceptance Rate (TAR), Runway Acceptance Rate (RAR) for the aviation industry!
title: fliteINTEL

api_list.name: Latest TRACON Acceptance Rate (TAR) for major US TRACONs
api_list.description: Provides the latest TRACON Acceptance Rate (TAR) available for major US Terminal Radar Approach Controls (TRACON). Please Enter the 3 letter TRACON code for your airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/metering/tar/tracon/{tra}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest Runway Acceptance Rate (RAR) for major US airports
api_list.description: Provides the latest Runway Acceptance Rate (RAR) available for major US airports. Please Enter the 3 letter domestic location code for your airport.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/metering/rar/airport/{location}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest TAF for all US Airports
api_list.description: Provides latest TAF for the US airport of your choice in iWXXM format - please enter your airport's ICAO code as parameter.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/weather/taf/us/iwxxm/items/{location}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest Metar for all US Airports
api_list.description: Provides the latest available METAR information for your chosen airport in iWXXM format - pass the ICAO code of the US airport as the parameter to receive the information
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com/v1/weather/metar/us/iwxxm/items/{location}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fliteintel1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Latest RVR for your Airport
